verses.verse: And there <S%H3212>went<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> to wife a <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son:<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> him that he was a <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H3206>child,<s%> she <S%H6845>hid<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3391>months.<s%>

And when she <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H6845>hide<s%> him, she <S%H3947>took<s%> for him an <S%H8392>ark<s%> of <S%H1573>bulrushes,<s%> and <S%H2560>daubed<s%> it with <S%H2564>slime<s%> and with <S%H2203>pitch,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> therein; and she <S%H7760>laid<s%> it in the <S%H5488>flags<s%> by the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H8193>brink.<s%>
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, to <S%H3045>wit<s%> what would be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> herself <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H2975>river;<s%> and her <S%H5291>maidens<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> along by the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H3027>side;<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5488>flags,<s%> she <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H519>maid<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it.

And when she had <S%H6605>opened<s%> it, she <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3206>child:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5288>babe<s%> <S%H1058>wept.<s%> And she had <S%H2550>compassion<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is one of the Hebrews' <S%H5680><s%><S%H3206>children.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> Shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> to you a <S%H3243>nurse<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> women, that she may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> for you?

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H3212>Go.<s%> And the <S%H5959>maid<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3206>child's<s%> <S%H517>mother.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H3212>Take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> away, and <S%H3243>nurse<s%> it for me, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you your <S%H7939>wages.<s%> And the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H5134>nursed<s%> it.

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and he <S%H1961>became<s%> her <S%H1121>son.<s%> And she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H4871>drew<s%> him out of the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H1431>grown,<s%> that he <S%H3318>went<s%> out to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on their <S%H5450>burdens:<s%> and he <S%H7200>spied<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5221>smiting<s%> an <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> one of his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And he <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H3541>way<s%> and that <S%H3541>way,<s%> and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> him in the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And when he <S%H3318>went<s%> out the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H5327>strove<s%> together: and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him that did the <S%H7563>wrong,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> you your <S%H7453>fellow?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> you a <S%H8269>prince<s%> and a <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? <S%H559>intend<s%> you to <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, as you <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian?<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3372>feared,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>Surely<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3045>known.<s%>

Now when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> he <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> and he <S%H3427>sat<s%> down by a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Now the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> had <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1802>drew<s%> water, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H7298>troughs<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

And the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1644>drove<s%> them away: but <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>stood<s%> up and <S%H3467>helped<s%> them, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> their <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>How<s%> is it that you are <S%H935>come<s%> so <S%H4116>soon<s%> to <S%H3117>day?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> An <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1802>drew<s%> water enough for us, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> And <S%H346>where<s%> is he? <S%H4100>why<s%> is it that you have <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H376>man?<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> him, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H376>man:<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1648>Gershom:<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in a <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in <S%H7227>process<s%> of <S%H3117>time,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H584>sighed<s%> by <S%H4480>reason<s%> of the <S%H5656>bondage,<s%> and they <S%H2199>cried,<s%> and their <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H430>God<s%> by <S%H4480>reason<s%> of the <S%H5656>bondage.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H5009>groaning,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and with <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3045>respect<s%> to them.
